citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30-2:45 on
10-Jan-18.
Arrived at facility and spoke with a family member. She stated that none of the owners were available and would
not return until approx. 7:00 this evening. She also stated she only assisted with cleaning the kennel and was not a
designated person to conduct inspections.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30-2:45 on
10-Jan-18.
Arrived at facility and spoke with a family member.  She stated that none of the owners were available and would
not return until approx. 7:00 this evening.  She also stated she only assisted with cleaning the kennel and was not a
designated person to conduct inspections.
